I'm Miro, a software engineer specializing in building unique and creative software solutions. With 3 years of bringing ideas to life through code, I believe technology should be fun to use and pleasing to the eye. When I'm not staring at my code editor, I'm staring at the league of legends client or battling bosses in Elden Ring. And to defy my reputation as a massive nerd, I do volunteer work weekly at my local scout group, raising a new generation of kids to be respectful and responsible citizens. I also own a pair of running and gym shoes that I like to take out multiple times a week. When I'm not doing any of those above I grab my Canon-AE1 and some Kodak Gold 200 film and go shooting outside capturing life and scenery of Helsinki.

About me

I'm Miro, a software engineer specializing in building unique and creative software solutions. With 3 years of bringing ideas to life through code, I believe technology should be fun to use and pleasing to the eye. When I'm not staring at my code editor, I'm staring at the league of legends client or battling bosses in Elden Ring. And to defy my reputation as a massive nerd, I do volunteer work weekly at my local scout group, raising a new generation of kids to be respectful and responsible citizens. I also own a pair of running and gym shoes that I like to take out multiple times a week. When I'm not doing any of those above I grab my Canon-AE1 and some Kodak Gold 200 film and go shooting outside capturing life and scenery of Helsinki.
